Name: Yohn Freddy
description:
Yohn Freddy was born in Timb√≠o, Cauca and has more than 18 years of experience as a farmer. Yohn has extensive agricultural knowledge which he implements in his own crops on a four-hectare terrain that he inherited from his father. He currently owns more than 8,000 coffee plants along with 3,000 plantain trees and a small batch of avocado saplings, which are highly productive thanks to the constant fertilization and maintenance processes he applies. Likewise, Yohn also works as a locksmith in his region to supplement his monthly income.

Yohn lives in a house he inherited from his parents with his five-year-old son. His son attends the local kindergarten and has shown great interest in following in his father's footsteps.

A $2,832,243 COP loan helps Yohn purchase organic nitrogen supplements that will improve the oxygenation of his crops and boost productivity.
